chain.name: Keeny's Secret
procedures: Talk to Phyllia in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Go to Orbis: Orbis Park and talk to Ericsson.

chain.name: Ericsson's Ingredients for Medicine 2
procedures: Talk to Orbis: Orbis Park at Sunset Road: Magatia.
Hunt for 100 Luster Pixie's Sunpiece and 10 Fierry's Tentacle.
Return to Ericsson and talk to him.

chain.name: A Sip of the Sun
procedures: Talk to Ericsson at Orbis: Orbis Park.
Go back to Sunset Road: Magatia and deliver the Drop of Sun to Phyllia.

name: Getting in the Way of Alcadno

chain.name: Getting in the Way of Alcadno
procedures: Equip the Zenumist's Cape.
Talk to Bedin at Zenumist Research Institute: Lab - 1st Floor Hallway in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Hunt 200 Reinforced Mithril Mutae.
Return to Bedin and talk to him.

name: An Incident, and the Missing Alchemist

chain.name: An Incident, and the Missing Alchemist
procedures: Equip the Zenumist's Cape.
Talk to Bedin at Zenumist Research Institute: Lab - 1st Floor Hallway in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Go to Alcadno Research Institute: Lab - Area A-3 and search for the Secret Document [2] in the dark.
Return to Bedin and talk to him.
chain.npcLocation: Zenumist Research Institute: Lab - 1st Floor Hallway

chain.name: Destroy the Roid
procedures: Equip Alcadno's Cape.
Talk to Russellon at Alcadno Research Institute: Lab - Center Gate in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Hunt and kill 80 Roid.
Return and talk to Russellon once you have completed the task.

name: Life Alchemy, and the Missing Alchemist

chain.name: Life Alchemy, and the Missing Alchemist
procedures: Equip Alcadno's Cape.
Talk to Russellon at Alcadno Research Institute: Lab - Center Gate in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Go to Alcadno Research Institute: Lab - Area B-1, and take the potion on top of the desk.
Return to Russellon and talk to him once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Parwen the Ghost
procedures: Talk to Parwen at Hidden Street: Authorized Personnel Only in Sunset Road: Magatia.

chain.name: Sejan's Good Habit
procedures: Talk to Sejan in Ariant: The Town of Ariant.
Collect 10,000 Bronze Arrow for Bow.
Return to him once you have collected the items.

chain.name: Making Mind and Heart Medicine 1
procedures: Talk to Do Gong at Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple.
Hunt for 10 Bear Foot from Grizzly or Panda.
Go to Mu Lung and talk to Tae Sang.

chain.name: Making Mind and Heart Medicine 2
procedures: Talk to Tae Sang at Mu Lung and you will obtain 1 Mind And Heart Medicine.
Head back to Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple and give the obtained item to Do Gong.

chain.name: The Legendary Being's Scroll 1
procedures: Talk to God of Mountains at Korean Folk Town: A Small Well.
You will obtain 1 The Legendary Being's Scroll (Beginner).
Head over to Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple and give the item to Do Gong.
chain.npcLocation: Korean Folk Town: A Small Well

chain.name: The Legendary Being's Scroll 2
procedures: Hunt for 1 The Legendary Being's Scroll (Advanced) from The Book Ghost.
Go to Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple and give the item to Do Gong.

chain.name: The Legendary Being's Scroll 3
procedures: Talk to Do Gong once again.
You will obtain 1 The Legendary Being's Scroll (Intermediate).
Head over to Korean Folk Town: A Small Well and talk to God of Mountains.

chain.name: The Lost Document
procedures: Talk to Do Gong at Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple.
Hunt for 10 The Book Ghost's Sheet of Paper from The Book Ghost.
Return to Do Gong and give him the items.

itemsNeeded.name: The Book Ghost's Sheet of Paper

chain.name: Eliminating the Spirited Cats
procedures: Talk to Do Gong at Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple.
Hunt for 5 Kitty Spirit from Sage Cat.
Kill 20 Sage Cat.
Return to Do Gong and give him the items.

name: Finding the Ingredients for Tae Sang

chain.name: Finding the Ingredients for Tae Sang
procedures: Talk to Tae Sang in Mu Lung.
Go to Herb Town: Over the Pirate Ship and join or create a party.  Talk to Guon to enter the Pirate Party Quest.
Hunt for 100 Ginseng Concentrate.
Hunt for 50 Bellflower Concentrate.
Return to Tae Sang after you have collected all the items.

chain.name: Keeny's Research on Roid
procedures: Talk to Keeny in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Hunt Roid for 80 Wires.
Return to Keeny and talk to her.

chain.name: Eliminating the Pirates
rewards: Scroll for Shoes for Speed 10% x 1
This quest can only be completed between levels 55 - 100.
procedures: Talk to Guon at Herb Town: Over the Pirate Ship.  Participate in the Pirate Party Quest.
Kill 200 Kru.
Kill 200 Captain.
Return to him after you have completed the given tasks.

chain.name: Pirate's Map
rewards: This quest can only be completed between levels 55 - 100.
procedures: Talk to Vikin at Lith Harbor.
Participate in the Pirate Party Quest in order to hunt for 6 Piece of the Pirate Map from Lord Pirate.
Return to him after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Captain Lord Pirate
rewards: Scroll for Gloves for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Gloves for ATT 10% x 1
This quest can only be completed between levels 55 - 100.
procedures: Before this quest can be initiated, you must obtain 1 Lord Pirate's Travel Diary which can be found from any chest during the Pirate Party Quest.
Talk to Captain Hwang in Herb Town.

Open the chest either in Stage 3A: Garden of the 100 Year Old Bellflowers I or Stage 4B: Garden of the 100 Year Old Bellflowers II with 1 Lord Pirate's Key to Chest until you obtain 1 Lord Pirate's Treasures
Return to Captain Hwang once you have completed the tasks.

chain.name: The Outlaw in the Sea
rewards: Scroll for Cape for HP 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for MP 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for LUK 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for INT 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for STR 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for DEX 60% x 1
This quest can only be completed between levels 55 - 100.
procedures: Talk to Guon at Herb Town: Over the Pirate Ship.  Participate in the Pirate Party Quest.
Kill 1 Lord Pirate.
Kill 1 Angry Lord Pirate.
Kill 1 Enraged Lord Pirate.
Return to him after you have completed the given tasks.
chain.npcLocation: Herb Town: Over the Pirate Ship

chain.name: Gathering Up the Lacking Ingredients
rewards:
For 100-Year-Old Bellflower x 1:
- 10 experience
- Red Potion x 1

For 100-Year-Old Bellflower x 50:
- 10,000 experience
- Dried Squid x 50

For 100-Year-Old Bellflower x 600:
- 54,000 experience
- Reindeer Milk x 50

For 100-Year-Old Bellflower x 1000:
- 54,000 experience
- Scroll for Overall Armor for DEX 60% x 1
- Power Elixir x 50
procedures: Talk to Mr. Ku in Herb Town.
Hunt for 1 100-Year-Old Bellflower from Sr. Bellflower Root.
Collect more 100-Year-Old Bellflower to obtain better rewards! Refer to the Remarks section below.
Return to him after you have collected the item.

chain.name: Eliminating the Spirited Monkeys
procedures: Talk to Tae Sang at Mu Lung.
Kill 50 Peach Monkey.
Return to Tae Sang.

chain.name: Collecting Peach Seeds
procedures: Talk to Tae Sang in Mu Lung.
Collect 100 Peach Seed from Peach Monkey.
Return to Tae Sang.

chain.name: Making Mastery Medicine
procedures: Talk to Tae Sang in Mu Lung.
Hunt for 10 Broken Deer Horn from Reindeer.
Hunt for 10 Ginseng-Boiled Water from Ginseng Jar.
Hunt for 10 100-Year-Old Bellflower from Sr. Bellflower Root.
Hunt for 6 Snake Leather from either Red Flower Serpent or Blue Flower Serpent.
Hunt for 4 Bear Foot from either Grizzly or Panda.
Return to him after you have collected all the items.

chain.name: Keeny's Research on Neo Huroid!
procedures: Talk to Keeny in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Hunt Neo Huroid for 160 Plug.
Return to Keeny and talk to her.

name: The Rumor in the Sea of Fog

chain.name: The Rumor in the Sea of Fog
rewards: This quest is currently glitched as of patch 0.83.
procedures: Talk to Captain Hwang at Herb Town.
Talk to Dolphin at ?.
Then talk to Norrington.

name: Humanoid Just Wants to be Human

chain.name: Humanoid A
procedures: Talk to Humanoid A in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Hunt for 100 Piece of Mithril from Mithril Mutae and 50 Gelatin from Cube Slime.
Collect 1 Snow Rose Seed by completing the quest, Acquiring the Seed for the Snowfield Rose.
Return to Humanoid A and talk to him.

chain.name: A Rose from the Snowfield
procedures: Talk to Humanoid A in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Hunt for several May Mist from Homunculus.
Return to Humanoid A and you will be brought to another area.
Drop the collected May Mist on the platforms to grow the Snow Rose.
Snap the Snow Rose away by attacking it.
Go to Phyllia in Sunset Road: Magatia and talk to her.

chain.name: Taking Out the Alligators 1
rewards: Scroll for One-Handed Sword for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for One-Handed Axe for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for One-Handed BW for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed Sword for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed Axe for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed BW for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Spear for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Pole Arm for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Wand for Magic Attack 10% x 1 if you are a Magician
Scroll for Staff for Magic Attack 10% x 1 if you are a Magician
Scroll for Bow for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Bowman
Scroll for Crossbow for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Bowman
Scroll for Dagger for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Thief
Scroll for Claw for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Thief
Scroll for Knuckler for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Pirate
Scroll for Gun for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Talk to Ayan in Perion.
Eliminate 250 Ligator.
Eliminate 40 Jr. Necki.
Hunt for 20 Jr. Necki's Skin from Jr. Necki.
Return to Ayan once you have completed the necessary tasks.

chain.name: Taking Out the Alligators 2
rewards: Scroll for Cape for STR 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for INT 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for DEX 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for LUK 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Ayan in Perion.
Eliminate 120 Croco.
Hunt for 50 Croco Skin from Croco.
Return to Ayan once you have completed the necessary tasks.

chain.name: Maya's First Collection
procedures: Talk to Maya in Henesys.
Hunt for 50 Snail Shell from Snail.
Hunt for 50 Blue Snail Shell from Blue Snail.
Hunt for 50 Mushroom Spore from Shroom.
Collect 50 Tree Branch.
Return to Maya and hand over the collected items to her.

chain.name: Maya's Second Collection
procedures: Talk to Maya in Henesys.
Hunt for 50 Fire Boar's Tooth from Fire Boar.
Hunt for 50 Bubbling's Large Bubble from Bubbling.
Hunt for 50 Tablecloth from Jr. Wraith.
Hunt for 50 Pig's Ribbon from Ribbon Pig.
Return to Maya and hand over the collected items to her.

chain.name: Maya's Third Collection
procedures: Talk to Maya in Henesys.
Hunt for 10 Lupin Doll from Lupin.
Hunt for 50 Tortie Shell from Tortie.
Hunt for 50 Cold Eye's Tail from Cold Eye.
Hunt for 50 Iron Hog's Metal Hoof from Iron Hog.
Return to Maya and hand over the collected items to her.

chain.name: Maya's Last Collection
procedures: Talk to Maya in Henesys.
Hunt for 50 Dark Stone Golem Rubble from Dark Stone Golem.
Hunt for 50 Wild Kargo's Eye from Wild Kargo.
Hunt for 50 Tauromacis' Horn from Tauromacis.
Hunt for 50 Clang's Claws from Clang.
Obtain 1 Diamond.
Return to Maya and hand over the collected items to her.

name: Ronnie & the Fairies Building a New House (Magician Only)

chain.name: First Material for Building a New House
procedures: Talk to Ronnie in Victoria Road: The Tree Tunnel At the Forest Up North.
Hunt for 50 Red Snail Shell from Red Snail.
Hunt for 50 Orange Mushroom Cap from Orange Mushroom.
Hunt for 50 Squishy Liquid from Slime.
Hunt for 50 Leaf from Dark Stump.
Head back to Ronnie and hand over the collected items to him.

chain.name: Second Material for Building a New House
procedures: Talk to Ronnie in Victoria Road: The Tree Tunnel At the Forest Up North.
Hunt for 50 Octopus Leg from Octopus.
Hunt for 50 Curse Eye's Tail from Curse Eye.
Hunt for 50 Wild Boar's Tooth from Wild Boar.
Hunt for 50 The Charm of the Undead from Zombie Mushroom.
Head back to Ronnie and hand over the collected items to him.
chain.npcLocation: Victoria Road: The Tree Tunnel At the Forest Up North

chain.name: Third Material for Building a New House
procedures: Talk to Ronnie in Victoria Road: The Tree Tunnel At the Forest Up North.
Hunt for 50 Stone Golem Rubble from Stone Golem.
Hunt for 50 Croco Skin from Croco.
Hunt for 50 Lupin's Banana from Lupin.
Collect 50 Drake's Skull.
Head back to Ronnie and hand over the collected items to him.
chain.npcLocation: Victoria Road: The Tree Tunnel At the Forest Up North

chain.name: Last Material for Building a New House
procedures: Talk to Ronnie in Victoria Road: The Tree Tunnel At the Forest Up North.
Hunt for 50 Medicine With Weird Vibes from Wraith.
Hunt for 50 Dark Stone Golem Rubble from Dark Stone Golem.
Hunt for 50 Wild Kargo's Eye from Wild Kargo.
Hunt for 50 Tauromacis' Horn from Tauromacis.
Obtain 1 Diamond.
chain.npcLocation: Victoria Road: The Tree Tunnel At the Forest Up North

name: Pia's Present for a Friend (Thief Only)

chain.name: Looking for the Red Cape
procedures: Talk to Pia in Victoria Road: Henesys Park.
Next, talk to Rina in Henesys.

chain.name: What Pia Has Borrowed
procedures: Talk to Rina in Henesys.
Hunt for 30 Tauromacis' Horn from Tauromacis.
Collect 1 Ancient Scroll from Dark Stone Golem.
Obtain 1 Black Crystal.
Return to Rina in Henesys and give her the collected items.

chain.name: Pia's Present for a Friend
rewards: The reward depends on the gender of your character.
procedures: Talk to Rina in Henesys.
Collect 50 Dragon Skin.
Obtain 40 Screw.
Obtain 15 Silver Plate.
Return to Pia and give her all of the collected items.

chain.name: Sacrifice to King Clang (Part I)
procedures: Talk to Riel in Florina Beach.

chain.name: Helping Rael
procedures: Talk to Rael in Florina Beach.
Eliminate 50 Tortie.
Return to her after you have completed the task.

chain.name: Helping Riel
procedures: Talk to Riel in Florina Beach.
Eliminate 50 Clang.
Return to her after you have completed the task.

chain.name: Helping Roel
procedures: Talk to Roel in Florina Beach.
Eliminate 50 Lorang.
Return to her after you have completed the task.

chain.name: Sacrifice to King Clang (Part II)
procedures: Return to Riel and talk to her.

chain.name: Doll in the Dark 1             (Level 55 and above)
procedures: Talk to Jay in Henesys.
Go to Ludibrium: Eos Tower Entrance and talk to Tigun the Advisor.

chain.name: Doll in the Dark 2             (Level 55 and above)
rewards: Dark Scroll for Bottomwear for DEF 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Bottomwear for HP 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Cape for HP 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Cape for INT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Gloves for HP 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Helmet for DEF 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Helmet for HP 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Helmet for INT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Shield for HP 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Topwear for HP 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Topwear for STR 30% x 1
procedures: Hunt for 50 Zombie Teddy Bear from Soul Teddy.
Go to Henesys and give the collected items to Jay.

chain.name: John's Last Present
procedures: Talk to John in Lith Harbor.
Go to Sleepywood and touch the Mysterious Statue.
Climb through the Forest of Patience and collect the White Viola.
Go back to John and give him the White Viola.

chain.name: Notice from the Excavation Team
rewards: Scroll for One-Handed Sword for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for One-Handed Axe for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for One-Handed BW for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed Sword for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed Axe for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed BW for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Spear for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Pole Arm for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Wand for Magic Attack 10% x 1 if you are a Magician
Scroll for Staff for Magic Attack 10% x 1 if you are a Magician
Scroll for Bow for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Bowman
Scroll for Crossbow for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Bowman
Scroll for Dagger for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Thief
Scroll for Claw for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Thief
Scroll for Knuckler for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Pirate
Scroll for Gun for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Talk to The Excavation Board located at Victoria Road: Excavation Site <Camp>.
Eliminate 200 Skeleton Soldier and collect 60 Rib.
Eliminate 100 Officer Skeleton and collect 40 Pelvic Bone.
Eliminate 40 Commander Skeleton and collect 20 Horse Skull.
Search for Shawn at Victoria Road: Excavation Site <Camp> after you have completed the tasks.

name: In Search of the Book of Ancient

chain.name: The Descendent of the Author of the Book of Ancient
procedures: Talk to Alcaster in El Nath: El Nath Market.
Look for Elma the Housekeeper in Orbis: Orbis Park.

chain.name: Hella's Missing
procedures: Talk to Elma the Housekeeper in Orbis: Orbis Park.
Head back to El Nath and look for Jade.

chain.name: Where's Hella?
procedures: Talk to Jade in El Nath.
Go back to Orbis: Orbis Park and talk to Elma the Housekeeper.

chain.name: One Clue
procedures: Talk to Elma the Housekeeper in Orbis: Orbis Park.
Once again, head back to El Nath and look for Jade.

chain.name: Looking for the Old Lady
procedures: Talk to Jade in El Nath.
Search for Spiruna, who is located in Old Man's House, in Orbis: Cloud Park IV. Talk to her repeatedly.

chain.name: Spiruna's Black Crystal
procedures: After talking to Spiruna, head over to El Nath: Ice Valley I and click on the Rock Covered in Snow.

chain.name: The Cracked Black Crystal
procedures: Go back to Spiruna and give her the collected item.

chain.name: To Restore the Crystal
procedures: Talk to ????.

chain.name: A Word from the Assistant
procedures: Head over to Orbis and talk to Kriel the Fairy .

chain.name: To Acquire the Fairy Dust
procedures: Hunt for 100 Star Pixie's Starpiece.
Hunt for 50 Lunar Pixie's Moonpiece.
Hunt for 30 Luster Pixie's Sunpiece.
Bring the collected items back to Kriel the Fairy .

chain.name: Acquiring the Fairy Dust
rewards: Scroll for Cape for Weapon Def 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for Weapon Def 10% x 1
Scroll for Cape for Magic Def 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for Magic Def 10% x 1
procedures: Give the Fairy Dust to Spiruna.

chain.name: The Truth Comes Out...
procedures: Spiruna will reveal that ????'s name is Hella. Talk to Hella.

chain.name: Hella is Found!
rewards: Scroll for Shoes for DEX 60% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for DEX 10% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Speed 60% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Speed 10% x 1
procedures: Head over to El Nath and talk to Jade.
Give Hella's Pendant to Jade.

chain.name: The Small Grave That's Hidden
procedures: Search for the Small Tomb at El Nath: Wolf Territory I and click on it.

chain.name: An Old Ring
procedures: Go to El Nath: El Nath Market and talk to Alcaster.

chain.name: An Old Ring (Scadur)
procedures: In El Nath, look for Scadur and talk to him.
He will take the Old Ring from you.

chain.name: Collecting Wolf Skin
procedures: Hunt for 80 Hector's Tail.
Hunt for 80 White Fang Tail.
Return to Scadur once you have collected the items.

chain.name: Looking for the Wiseman in Perion
procedures: Travel to Perion and talk to Dances with Balrog.

chain.name: Dances with Balrog and His Recovery
procedures: Collect 2 Power Crystal.
Return to Dances with Balrog after you have collected the item.

chain.name: Looking for the Wiseman in Ellinia
procedures: Travel to Ellinia and talk to Grendel the Really Old.

chain.name: Grendel the Really Old and His Recovery
procedures: Collect 2 Wisdom Crystal.
Return to Grendel the Really Old after you have collected the item.

chain.name: Looking for the Wiseman in Henesys
procedures: Travel to Victoria Road: Henesys Park and talk to Athena Pierce.

chain.name: Athena Pierce and Her Recovery
procedures: Collect 2 DEX Crystal.
Return to Athena Pierce after you have collected the item.

chain.name: Looking for the Wiseman in Kerning City
procedures: Travel to Kerning City and talk to Dark Lord.

chain.name: Dark Lord and His Recovery
procedures: Collect 2 LUK Crystal.
Return to Dark Lord after you have collected the item.

chain.name: All the Map Pieces in One Piece
procedures: Go back to Alcaster in El Nath: El Nath Market and talk to him.

chain.name: Restoring the Map
procedures: Search for Corporal Easy in Orbis: Cloud Park VI and talk to him.

chain.name: Acquiring the Memory Powder
procedures: Hunt for 3 Werewolf's Toenail.
Return to Corporal Easy after you have collected the items.

chain.name: The Map is in One Piece
procedures: Bring the obtained item to Alcaster in El Nath: El Nath Market.

chain.name: The Secrets Behind the Statue
procedures: Go to Orbis: Orbis Tower <8th Floor> and inspect the Statue.

chain.name: The  Book of Ancient is Back!
procedures: Return to Alcaster in El Nath: El Nath Market and give him the obtained item.

chain.name: Ready for Revival
procedures: Talk to Shammos in El Nath: Chief's Residence.
Talk to Manji in Perion.
Talk to Manji once again and you will be given the next quest, Preparing for the Revival.

chain.name: Preparing for the Revival
rewards: Scroll for Shoes for DEX 60% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for DEX 10% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Jump 60% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Jump 10% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Speed 60% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Speed 10% x 1
In addition to the Random Reward(s) listed above, it is also possible to receive -2 Fame as a Random Reward.
procedures: Hunt for The Contract Of Darkness from Coolie Zombie or Miner Zombie.
Head over to El Nath: Chief's Residence and give the item to Shammos.

chain.name: Lisa's Letter of Recommendation
procedures: Talk to Lisa in Orbis.
Pass Lisa's Letter of Recommendation to Scadur in El Nath.

chain.name: Acquiring Materials for the Fur Coat
rewards: Scroll for Overall Armor for DEF 60% x 1
Scroll for Overall Armor for DEX 60% x 1
Scroll for Overall Armor for LUK 60% x 1
Scroll for Overall Armor for INT 60% x 1
procedures: Collect 50 Sapphire Ore.
Collect 80 Yeti's Horn.
Collect 250 Hector's Tail.
Collect 250 White Fang Tail.
Return to Scadur and give him all of the collected items.

chain.name: Alcaster and the Dark Crystal
procedures: Talk to Alcaster in El Nath: El Nath Market.
Obtain 1 Dark Crystal from either Arwen the Fairy or Vogen.
Refine 1 Star Rock from either Spiruna or Vogen.
Return to Alcaster and give him the collected items.

chain.name: Remnants of Memory
rewards: Dark Scroll for Accessory for STR 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Accessory for DEX 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Accessory for INT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Accessory for LUK 30% x 1
procedures: Talk to Shammos at El Nath: Chief's Residence.
Hunt for 1 Shammos's Diary Page 5, 1 Shammos's Diary Page 6, 1 Shammos's Diary Page 7, 1 Shammos's Diary Page 8, and 1 Shammos's Diary Page 9 from Hector and White Fang.
Return and talk to Shammos.

chain.name: Shammos's Awakening
procedures: Talk to Shammos at El Nath: Chief's Residence.

name: Nick, the Son of Scadur the Hunter

chain.name: Traces Of Nick
procedures: Talk to Scadur in El Nath.
Go to El Nath: The Cave of Trial II and jump onto the edge of the second lava pool.  You should now be in Hidden Street: Cave Within the Cave.
Locate Nick's Ring at the Crumbling Statue.

chain.name: Nick's Ring
procedures: Hunt for 80 Cerebes' Tooth.
Return to Scadur and give him the items.

name: Acquiring the Seed for the Snowfield Rose

chain.name: Acquiring the Seed for the Snowfield Rose
procedures: Talk to Alcaster in El Nath: El Nath Market.
Hunt and kill 100 Leatty.
Return to Alcaster and talk to him.

chain.name: Recollection
procedures: Talk to Shammos at El Nath: Chief's Residence.
Then talk to Shammos located in the same map.

chain.name: Hoblin King
procedures: Talk to Shammos at El Nath: Chief's Residence.
Then talk to Tylus located in the same map.

chain.name: Shammos's Regained Memory
procedures: Talk to Shammos at El Nath: Chief's Residence.

chain.name: Eliminating Ghosts
procedures: Talk to Hikari in Zipangu: Showa Town.
Kill 100 Nightghost.
Return to Hikari once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Water Goblin's Cucumber
rewards: This quest is glitched. Although it says you need 40 cucumbers, you must actually collect 50.
procedures: Talk to Hikari in Zipangu: Showa Town.
Hunt for 40 Cucumber.
Kill 80 Water Goblin.
Return to Hikari once you have completed the tasks.

chain.name: Tiger-Hunting
procedures: Talk to Chumji in Korean Folk Town
Kill 10 Hogul and collect 10 Tiger Skin.
Return to Chumji once you have completed the tasks.

chain.name: The Fox Hunt
procedures: Talk to Chumji in Korean Folk Town.
Hunt for 333 Three-Tailed Foxtail by killing Samiho.
Return to Chumji for your reward after you have collected these items.

chain.name: Operation Strategy 1: Collect All the Eggs             (Level 59 and above)
procedures: Talk to Ghosthunter Bob in Ludibrium: Forgotten Path of Time <1>.
Hunt for 10 Tick-Tock's Egg from Tick-Tock and 10 Chronos's Egg from Chronos.
Double click on the eggs in your USE inventory to open them.  Obtain 10 Timer's Egg this way.  If you run out of eggs, hunt more Tick-Tock and Chronos.
Once you have 10 Timer's Egg, 10 Tick-Tock's Egg and 10 Chronos's Egg, return to Ghosthunter Bob.

chain.name: Operation Strategy 2:  Defeat the Monsters             (Level 59 and above)
procedures: Talk to Ghosthunter Bob in Ludibrium: Forgotten Path of Time <1>.
Hunt 20 Tick-Tock, 30 Chronos, 40 Platoon Chronos, 50 Master Chronos and 1 Timer.
Return to Ghosthunter Bob.

chain.name: Operation Strategy 3:  A Cute Baby Bird             (Level 59 and above)
procedures: Talk to Ghosthunter Bob in Ludibrium: Forgotten Path of Time <1> and receive 1 Timer's Egg [2].
Collect 30 Springy Worm.
Double click on Timer's Egg [2] in your ETC inventory.  A little window will appear that shows what Timer's Egg [2] looks like.
Drag and drop the Springy Worm one by one onto the little window of Timer's Egg [2].
Return to Ghosthunter Bob.

chain.name: Protect Ludibrium
procedures: Talk to Mr. Bouffon at Ludibrium: Path of Time.
Hunt for 10 Tachion from Soul Teddy, Buffy, Lazy Buffy or Master Soul Teddy.
Return to Mr. Bouffon with the item.

chain.name: The Replacement Time Energy
procedures: Talk to Mr. Bouffon at Ludibrium: Path of Time.
Hunt for 300 Tachion from Soul Teddy, Buffy, Lazy Buffy or Master Soul Teddy.
Hunt for 100 Mysterious Powder from Master Death Teddy.
Go back to Mr. Bouffon and give him the collected items.

chain.name: The Time Sphere
procedures: Talk to Mr. Bouffon at Ludibrium: Path of Time.
In the same map, talk to Flo.
You will initiate the next quest, A Piece of Crack.
After you have obtained 1 Piece of Cracked Dimension, talk to Mr. Bouffon.

chain.name: Papulatus             (Level 80 and above)
procedures: Hunt for 1 Ludibrium Medal from Gatekeeper or Thanatos.
Go to Ludibrium: Deep Inside of Watch Tower and press up to enter the door in the middle of the map, as shown in the image below.
Once you have entered, drop 1 Piece of Cracked Dimension in front of the cracked hole and wait for a few seconds, as shown in the image below.
Time Sphere will appear.  Defeat it.
Papulatus Clock will spawn.  Defeat it.
Return to Mr. Bouffon at Ludibrium: Path of Time to receive your rewards.

chain.name: Mason the Collector I
rewards: Bloctopus & Pink Teddy Omok Set x 1
Panda Teddy & Pink Teddy Omok Set x 1
Panda Teddy & Trixter Omok Set x 1
procedures: Talk to Mason the Collector in Ludibrium: Ludibrium Village.
Hunt for 1 Aurora Marble from Lazy Buffy.
Return to Mason the Collector after you have collected the item.

chain.name: Mason the Collector II
procedures: Talk to Mason the Collector in Ludibrium: Ludibrium Village.
Hunt for 10 Aurora Marble from Lazy Buffy.
Hunt for 50 Lazy Buffy's Marble from Lazy Buffy.
Return to Mason the Collector after you have collected the items to receive your rewards.

chain.name: Preparing to Eliminate Goblins
procedures: Talk to Chumji in Korean Folk Town.
Obtain 1 Roasted Pork from Chil Sung.
Obtain 1 Buckwheat Paste from Chil Nam.
Obtain 1 Rice Wine from Kong Ji.
Return to Chumji once you have obtained these items.

chain.name: Eliminate Goblins
rewards: Storybook on The Goblin Story x 1
procedures: Talk to Chumji in Korean Folk Town again.
Head over to Hidden Street: Haunted House.

Drop the items as shown in the images below. Drop them 1 at a time.

1 Roasted Pork in front of a stack of rocks.

1 Rice Wine in front of a stone lantern.

1 Buckwheat Paste inside a tree hole.
Kill 1 Yellow King Goblin and pick up 1 Goblin Cap.
Kill 1 Blue King Goblin and pick up 1 Goblin Bat.
Kill 1 Green King Goblin and pick up 1 Goblin Cape.
Return to Chumji.

chain.name: A Piece of Crack
procedures: This quest is initiated by talking to Flo.
Hunt for 1 Piece of Cracked Dimension A from Gigantic Spirit Viking and Grim Phantom Watch.
Hunt for 1 Piece of Cracked Dimension B from Gigantic Spirit Viking and Grim Phantom Watch.
Hunt for 1 Piece of Cracked Dimension C from Gigantic Spirit Viking and Grim Phantom Watch.
Return to Flo once you have collected all of the items.
Continue the Protect Ludibrium quest.

name: Retrieving the Storybook: The Goblin Tale

chain.name: Retrieving the Storybook: The Goblin Tale
procedures: Once you have obtained 1 Storybook on The Goblin Story from Goblin at Black Mountain quest, talk to Wiz the Librarian at Ludibrium: Helios Tower <Library>.

chain.name: The Lost Medal
procedures: Talk to Mr. Bouffon at Ludibrium: Path of Time.
In the same map, search for Flo and talk to him.

chain.name: Free Spirit
procedures: Talk to Ghosthunter Bob in Ludibrium: Forgotten Path of Time <1>.
Hunt for 100 Free Spirit from Master Soul Teddy.
Return to Ghosthunter Bob with the items.

chain.name: Artificial Combatant Zeno
procedures: Talk to Dr. Kim in Omega Sector: Command Center.
Head over to Omega Sector: Kulan Field II, look for Alien Gray and talk to him.

chain.name: The Ultrasonic Wave Decoder
rewards: Repeat this quest if you receive the False Wave Translator.
procedures: Return to Dr. Kim in Omega Sector: Command Center and talk to him.
Hunt for 30 Receiving Apparatus from Ultra Gray.
Hunt for 30 Small Spaceship from Zeta Gray.
Hunt for 10 Grey Tentacle from Ultra Gray, or Barnard Gray.
Hunt for 1 Chief Gray's Sign from Chief Gray.
Return to Dr. Kim once you have collected all these items.

chain.name: The Imperiled Grays
procedures: Go back and talk to Alien Gray in Omega Sector: Kulan Field II.
Return to Dr. Kim in Omega Sector: Command Center.

chain.name: The Battle Against Zeno
procedures: Talk to Dr. Kim in Omega Sector: Command Center.
Head over to Hidden Street: Gray's Prairie and defeat Zeno.
Return to Dr. Kim once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Poor Blondie
procedures: Talk to Chee Wee in Malaysia: Muddy Banks 1.
Eliminate 150 Dark Fission.
Obtain 100 Yellow Wig.
Return to Chee Wee and give him the collected items.

chain.name: Running Out of Wigs!
procedures: Talk to [node:8179 link] in Malaysia: Muddy Banks 1.
Eliminate 200 Dark Fission.
Obtain 200 Yellow Wig.
Return to Chee Wee and give him the collected items.

chain.name: Tires are Missing!
procedures: Talk to Chee Wee in Malaysia: Muddy Banks 1.
Eliminate 50 Oly Oly.
Obtain 50 Somebody's Tire.
Return to Chee Wee and give him the collected items.

chain.name: Oly Oly is Back!
procedures: Talk to Chee Wee in Malaysia: Muddy Banks 1.
Eliminate 100 Oly Oly.
Obtain 100 Somebody's Tire.
Return to Chee Wee and give him the collected items.

chain.name: Hunger Calls
procedures: Talk to Nuri in Malaysia: Hibiscus Road 2.
Purchase 10 Laksa from Ali in Malaysia: Kampung Village.
Return to Nuri and give her the items.

chain.name: I Need Vitamin C
procedures: Talk to Nuri in Malaysia: Hibiscus Road 2.
Purchase 5 Apple and 5 Orange from Candy in Singapore: Boat Quay Town.
Return to Nuri and give her the items.

chain.name: My Lovely Scarf
procedures: Talk to Nuri in Malaysia: Hibiscus Road 2.
Hunt for 50 Scarf from Scaredy Scarlion.
Return to Nuri and give her the collected items.

chain.name: My Scarfs are Stolen!
procedures: Talk to Nuri in Malaysia: Hibiscus Road 2.
Hunt for 100 Scarf from Scaredy Scarlion.
Return to Nuri and give her the collected items.

chain.name: The Secret of the Past
procedures: Talk to Ralph the Wanderer in Singapore: Boat Quay Town.
Kill 100 Pac Pinky.
Kill 100 Slimy.
Return to Ralph the Wanderer once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Making the Path to the Sea
procedures: Talk to Ralph the Wanderer in Singapore: Boat Quay Town.
Kill 120 Slimy.
Kill 120 Selkie Jr..
Return to Ralph the Wanderer once you have completed the task.

chain.name: The Great Secret Reveals
procedures: Talk to Ralph the Wanderer in Singapore: Boat Quay Town.
Kill 300 Mr. Anchor.
Return to Ralph the Wanderer once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Fight for the Future
procedures: Talk to Ralph the Wanderer in Singapore: Boat Quay Town.
Hunt for 1 Black Essence from Capt. Latanica.
Return to Ralph the Wanderer once you have completed the task.
